title: Number of Carrabba 's Italian Grill restaurants in the U.S. from 2011 to 2018
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing Company-owned, and Franchised. The y axis denotes Number of restaurants and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Company-owned, and Franchised are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Company-owned, and lastly, 2. Franchised.
Overall across the Year, Company-owned mostly maintained the highest Number of restaurants when compared to others with a mean value of 235.12, and it peaked at 2015.
The botommost line, Franchised,  has a mean of 1.88, and peaked at 2015, 2017, and 2018.
min_summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Company-owned, and Franchised. The y axis indicates the Number of restaurants and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Company-owned, and Franchised are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Throughout the period, Company-owned generally had the highest Number of restaurants relative to others with an average of 235.12, and it reached its maximum at 2015 with a value of 244.0.
Franchised mostly had the least Number of restaurants with a mean value of 1.88, which peaked at 2015, 2017, and 2018 with a value of 3.0.
